text: Kot Sultan railway station () is located in Kot Sultan, (A beautiful town of Layayh District of Punjab) Pakistan. Kot sultan is also a village of Layyah city ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Layyah District Category:Railway stations on Kotri–Attock Railway Line (ML 2)
title: Kot Sultan railway station
